| History                 = The Koschei Family are a Russian Mafia family who claimed to have been descended from [[Koschei (Earth-616)|Koschei]] and follow the teachings of [[Russian]] Folklore. They felt threatened by the [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Kingpin]]'s inroads into their territory in Brooklyn, turned to mysticism to summon the demonic witch [[Baba Yaga (Earth-616)|Baba Yaga]]. They miscalculated, believing that they would be able to control her. Baba Yaga took over the Koschei, but was later defeated by beheaded by [[Elektra Natchios (Earth-616)|Elektra]].{{r|Herc Vol 1 10}}
